resources.string: Učitavanje grada neuspelo, fajl je oštećen.\n\nIzvini.
Da li stvarno želiš da izbrišeš?
Da li si siguran da želiš da izađeš iz TheoTown?
Molim te, koristi drugo ime za ovaj grad. Nije dozvoljeno da bude prazno.
Ova veličina je samo eksperiment i možda neće raditi na tvom uređaju. Da li stvarno trebaš ogromnu mapu?
Velikom gradu treba Gradska Skupština. Stanovnicima će se svideti.
Koristi razvod struje da povežeš svoj grad sa elektranom.
Turbina pravi buku ali ne zagađuje okolinu.
Elektrana na ugalj stvara mnogo struje, ali je loša za okolinu.
Solarni paneli su dobri za okolinu i ne zagađuju okolinu.
Stanovnicima će se svideti veliki park.
Stanovnici se osećaju sigurnije blizu bolnice.
Mesto gde starija deca uče stvari.
Mesto gde stari ljudi uče stvari.
Cevi se mogu koristiti da sprovedu vodu do tvojih građevina.
Snabdeva tvoje građevine malom količinom vode.
Mesto gde mladi stanovnici uče stvari kada su prestari za osnovnu školu.
Mali park sa drvećem. Tvojim stanovnicima će se svideti.
Nijedna životinja nije povređena tokom proizvodnje!
Možda bi hteo da pritisneš donji desni ugao.
Postoji dugme za donaciju na početnoj strani.
Čestitam, tvoj grad prevazilazi veličinu od %1$,d stanovnika!
Mali park sa drvećem. Tvojim stanovnicima će se svideti.
Nije moguće napraviti fasciklu za čuvanje za %1$s. Molim te, proveri dozvoljenje pristupe aplikacije.
Stanovnici će graditi kuće na ovom području.
Komercijalne zgrade će se graditi na ovom području.
Industrijske zgrade će se graditi na ovom području.
Auti mogu da brzo voze na njemu.
Ovde stanovnici mogu čekati autobus i voziti se njime na drugi deo grada.
Autobusko skladište je potreban da bi se autobusi stvarali.
Sa ovom alatkom, možeš da ukloniš sve osim zoni i cevi.
Ova alatka može da ukloni cevi za vodu.
Fusbalski teren će usrećiti tvoje stanovnike.
Ovde bi moglo biti tvoje reklamiranje.
Deca mogu da se igraju ovde.
Deca mogu da igraju tenis ovde.
Paviljon gde mogu žurke da se održe.
Sat će obavestiti ljude o trenutnom vremenu.
Nije mnogo struje preostalo. Možda ćeš trebati da napraviš nove elektrane.
Jedva imaš dovoljno vode. Možda bi trebao da izgradiš nove hidrante za vodu.
Možeš li nam izgraditi još religioznih građevina?
Želeli bi da imamo više parkova.
Sa krovom, utakmice se mogu odigrati po svakom vremenu.
Stvari za fanove se prodaju ovde.
Požar! Pošalji vatrogasce da ugase vatru. Razmisli o gradnji više vatrogasnih uprava.
Tvojim stanovnicima će se svideti radio program.
Pozovi vatrogasnu brigadu ako nešto gori.
Kada se desi neka nesreća, moraš da pozoveš Doktora.
Šalje najnovije vesti u gradu. Poboljšava obrazovanje. \n \nSamo jedan radio program je dozvoljen. Stari program će biti uklonjen.
Šalje sportske novosti i uzbudljive prenose sportskih dešavanja. Radi kao sportsko igralište sa velikom daljinom. \n \nSamo jedan radio program je dozvoljen. Stari program će biti uklonjen.
Šalje muziku i zabavni program. Slušaoci se osećaju bolje. Radi kao park sa velikom daljinom. \n \nSamo jedan radio program je dozvoljen. Stari program će biti uklonjen.
Šalje razgovore o veri i našem postojanju. Radi kao religijska građevina sa velikom daljinom. \n \nSamo jedan radio program je dozvoljen. Stari program će biti uklonjen.
Nema brodova, ali postoji svetionik .... čudno.
Uvek možeš da prikažeš i sakriješ mini-mapu.
Krenućemo izgradnjom puteva. Izaberi najjednostavniju vrstu puta.
Postavi put po označenim kvadratima. Da ga postaviš, pritisni na početak i onda pritisni na kraj puta.
Odličan posao! Izađi iz režima gradnje puteva.
Možeš da koristiš razvod struje da prenosiš enegiju.
Probaj da napraviš vodeni toranj da bi snabdevao svoj grad vodom.
Vodeni toranj nije dovoljan. Trebaju ti cevi da bi prenosio vodu.
Odličan posao. Sada možeš početi sa proglašivanjem područja.
Zone odlučuju ko može da gradi gde. Postoje tri vrste zoni.
Deklasiraj stambene zone. Stanovnici mogu da grade kuće tamo.
Nastavi sa komercijalnim zonama. Komercijale će se graditi ovde.
Sada nastavi sa Industrijskim zonama. Fabrike će se graditi ovde.
Odličan posao. Sada će se građevine graditi.
Trebalo bi da pomeriš industrijske zone od ostalih zbog zagađenja i buke.
Pritisni ovo dugme da vidiš zahteve za zone detaljno.
Možeš da promeniš brzinu simulacije kako bi nebi mnogo čekao.
Sada je vrati na normalnu brzinu.
Tvoj zadatak je da zarađuješ pare od poreza kako bi proširio grad.
Pritisni na dugme u donjem desnom uglu da vidiš više informacija o tvom novčanom stanju ili da promeniš poreze.
Čestitam, naučio si osnove TheoTown-a. Sada možeš da započneš svoj grad. :)
Auti će voziti samo u jednom pravcu na ovom putu. Koristi ga da kontrolišeš saobraćaj.
Požar u tvom gradu! Izgradi vatrogasne službe da ugase vatru.
Uništena građevina. Trebalo bi da je ukloniš.
Molim vas, dajte mi novčić, mnogo mi treba :(
Veliki krater meteorita. Trebalo bi da ga ukloniš.
Mali krater meteorita. Trebalo bi da ga ukloniš.
Mogao bi da nas podržiš pritiskanjem na oglase :)
Tornadi su velika opasnost za tvoj grad.
Jeftina zona za farme. Minimalna veličina za farme je 4x4.
Uticaj vatrogasnih uprava smanjuje mogućnost požara.
Doktori pomažu da tvoji stanovnici ostanu zdravi.
Niko ne želi da živi u bučnoj oblasti.
Čini tvoje stanovnike srećnim i omogućava veću gustinu građevina.
Niko ne želi da živi u zagađenoj okolini.
Industrijska zona za dokove u tvom gradu.
Prikazuje zgrade koje nebi smele da se uklone.
Mala Gradska Skupština će odgvarati tvom gradu.
Mora da se izgradi blizu vode.
Smanjuje količinu zagađene vode puštanjem je u prirodu. Ima loše posledice.
Cities will be saved in internal storage. You will have no access to them.
Proizvodi više struje nego elektrana na ugalj. Skuplja je za održavanje i zahteva MNOGO vode za hlađenje. Možda će da eksplodira bez vode.
Jeftinija nego ostale elektrane. Malo zagađenja.
Nema preostalog novca. Trebalo bi da uzmeš kredit.
Koristi ovu alatku da ukloniš zone.
Pokreće pobunu koje mogu da zaustave samo policijski SAJ
Ljudi žele da žive u našem gradu. Deklariši stambenu zonu za njih.
Izgradi komercijalne zone da bi se prodavnice gradile u našem gradu.
Industrije će se možda graditi u našem gradu, ali prvo moraš da deklarišeš zone za njih.
Ova policijska stanica će dovesti tišinu i red u tvoj grad.
Neke zgrade nemaju prilaz za vozila. Trebalo bi da to popraviš.
Imamo neku veoma zagađenu vodu ovde!
TheoTown je mnogo napredovo otkad je ovaj grad napravljem. Možda neće dobro raditi. Molim te, nemoj da nas mrziš (◕‿◕✿)
Slabo zdravlje. Trebalo bi da poboljšaš okolinu ili da napraviš medicinske zgrade.
Unesi novo ime za tvoj grad.
Unesi novo ime za ovu građevinu.
Izvini, tvoj uređaj nema dovoljno RAM memorije da bi pokrenuo TheoTown.
Da li želiš da sačuvaš svoj grad pre zatvaranja?
Imamo neki kriminal ovde. Trebalo bi da napraviš više policijskih stanica da bi poboljšao sreću.
Možda trebamo da poboljšamo saobraćaj izgradnjom magistralnog puta. Označi glavni put.
Dodirni na početnu i na završnu tačku isplaniranog puta. Vidi kako će se most automatski izgraditi preko reke.
Ako postoji pobuna, samo SAJ može da ga zaustavi.
Postoji demonstracija u našem gradu zbog %1s! Uradi nešto ili će se nešto loše desiti!
Perfektan put za konektovanje dalekih lokacija.
Ljudi su nesrećni zbog %1$s. Trebalo bi da pokušaš da poboljšaš sreću.
Prebaci grad u slobodni režim?\n\nOvo ne može da se poništi!
Čestitam, tvoj grad %1$s je dostigao novi rang:
Helikopteri mogu da se spuštaju i podižu ovde.\n\nPovećava domet vatrogasne službe.
Sva podešavanja će biti izgubljena. Da li si siguran?
Neindefikovani Leteći Objekat napada tvoj grad!
Rad u toku. Ne prelazi liniju.
Izgradiću svoj grad sa neboderima i parkovima
Opusti se, to je samo igra
Veća srednja škola za više studenata.
Sa ovom težinom, krećeš sa mnogo novca i malo je lakše uopšte.
Podrazumevana težina. Krećeš sa dobrom količinom novca i nije teško da napraviš grad svojih snova.
Ti si profesionalac u TheoTown-u? Onda je ovo prava težina za tebe. Krećeš sa malo novca i teško je uopšte.
Moramo da poboljšamo %1$s sreću tako da %2$s mogu da se usele u naš grad.
Možeš da otključaš ovaj rang odma, ako želiš.
Neke male stambene, komercijalne i industrijske građevine za veću raznovrsnost u gradu. Obuhvata i izgled za zimu.
Izgleda da su ovi dijamanti tvoji sada.
Da li želiš da povežeš ovaj put sa ostalim gradovima?
Da li želiš da otključaš ovu oblast da bi napravio novi grad ovde?
Magistrala napravljena i plaćena od države.
Put napravljen i plaćen od države.
Da li želiš da resetuješ ovaj grad na njegovo prvobitno stanje? Ovo ne može da se poništi.
Nacionalni put u jednom smeru napravljen i plaćen od države.
Tvoj grad je samo deo od nečeg većeg. Ovde možeš da vidiš sve svoje gradove.

U TheoTown-u mi razlikujemo zahteve za zgrade za drugačije vrste zgradi i nivoa. Vrste zgradi su stambene, komercijalne i industrijske. Postoje tri vrste nivoa, siromašni (₮), srednji (₮₮) i bogati (₮₮₮).
Dobrodošao u tvoj novi grad.\n\nProbaj da dobiješ 300 stanovnika.
Čestitam, tvoj grad je dostigao novi rang.\n\nSvaki rang otključava nove građevine i dobijaš nagradu.
Ne možeš da otključaš više od %1$,d mapi odjednom.
Potrebno je mnogo rada da se otključa mapa. Da li želiš da nas podržiš? Ovo će skratiti vreme otključavanja za 30 minuta.
Otključali smo ovu mapu za tebe.
Unesi novo ime za ovaj region.
Velika Gradska Skupština za veliki grad. Hvala za 1 M preuzimanja.
Ova pumpa za vodu je u zagađenoj okolini. Trebalo bi da je premestimo negde da bi zadržali vodu čistom.
Trebamo da uklonimo ovo đubre pre nego što ga neko primeti.
Vreme je da obrazujemo našu decu. Napravi osnovnu školu.
Hajde da obrazujemo našu stariju decu. Napravi srednju školu.
Ima previše saobraćaja na ovom putu. Trebalo bi da napraviš više ili boljih puteva.
%1$s je zaradio %2$s dok si bio odsutan.
Ova škola je puna. Molim te, napravi više škola.
Nemamo dovoljno novca da kupimo ovo.\n\nDa li želiš da uzmeš nedostajalih %1$s odma?
Nema dovoljno mesta u ovoj bolnici. Moramo da napravimo još jednu.
Da li ti se sviđa TheoTown?
Onda nas oceni, molim te. Potreban je samo jedan momenat.
Bilo kakvi predlozi kako bi mogli da poboljšamo igru? Molim te, kaži nam.
Da li želiš da preskočiš %1$,d dana?
Dambldor ne bi dopustio da se ovo desi.
Izgradi svoju vojnu bazu da bi zaštitio svoj grad. Dodaje i NLO katastrofu.
Nauka! Pronašli smo rešenje kako da poboljšamo rezoluciju igre. Da li bi želeo da ga koristiš?\n\nOvo se može promeniti u podešavanjima bilo kad.
Vojne zgrade se mogu graditi samo u ovoj zoni.
Put napravljen za vojna vozila i vanredna vozila. Ne možeš graditi ostale puteve u vojnoj zoni.
Štab je najvažnija zgrada tvoje vojne baze.
Može se koristiti za pucanje NLOa. Ne bi smeo da se koristi za pucanje građanskih građevina i vozila.
Ministarstvo bi želeo da testira rakete u tvom gradu. Ovo bi moglo dovesti do katastrofi ali bi dobio nadoknadu za rizik.
Ova mala planina je turistička atrakcija na uobičajenoj ravnici.
Ova mala planina je turistička atrakcija na uobičajenoj ravnici.
Da li želiš da uspostaviš konekciju sa spoljašnoću?
Ups... Bojim se da je naš zadnji raketni test izazvao galaktičku katastrofu.
Gradonačelniče, potreban si nam da potrošiš sav novac!
Velike stambene, komercijalne i industrijske zgrade za veću raznolikost u gradu. Povećava životni standard tvojih građana.
Unesi novi text za ovu oznaku ili je ukloni.
Napravi, promeni i ukloni oznake sa ovom alatkom.
Neke dekoracije za tvoju komercijalnu zonu.
Sporija brzina koja ti daje veću kontrolu u nekim situacijama.
Običan pesak. Koristi se za plaže.
Prikaži saobraćaj u alatki za put
Vatrogasna stanica sa velikim opsegom, puno automobila i nadogradnja heliodroma za helikopter.
Šta sa nekim moto sportovima u vašem gradu? Takođe će pokrenuti kartinig na normalnom putu.
Ima veći opseg i više automobila. Korisno za sprečavanje ili gašenje požara.
Šta sa nekim moto sportovima u vašem gradu? Takođe će pokrenuti kartinig na normalnom putu.
Međutim, hajde da izgradimo veliki grad, ali možda bi trebalo da počnemo polako.
Dodirnite ekran da bi ste pomerili mapu. Možete uveličati sa dva prsta.
Odlično, mislim da sada imate osećaj za kontrole. Dakle, možemo početi sa vašim prvim gradom
Kako zgodno, narod je već napravio neke puteve ovde, pa možemo da ih koristimo besplatno.
Hajde da proglasimo stambeno područje ovde. Ljudi će tada sami graditi kuće.
Bolje da okružimo područje nekim putevima. Ljudi će graditi samo na blizini puta.
Sada nam preostaje da sačekamo ljude da se usele u njihov grad.
Hej! Šta je to?! Izgleda da neko nema struje?!
Naravno da nema. Mi nemamo izvor energije, još uvek. Hajdemo izgraditi solarne panele blizu autoputa.
Sada nam je potreban razvod struje kako bi smo povezali stambene prostore sa našim panelima.
Izgradnja panela traje nekog vremena. Možete sačekati ili dodirnuti na izgradnju kako bi ste ubrzali proces izgradnje, ovoga puta besplatno.
Uredu, imamo struju sada. Ali čekaj, šta je to sada?! Ljudi takođe žele da imaju vodu?
Nije tako teško. Hajde da izgradimo toranj vode da obezbedimo vodu ljudima.
Ovde takođe moramo sačekati da bi se toranj izgradio. Umesto čekanja mi možemo ubrzati proces izgradnje dijamantima.
Za vodu koristimo sistem cevi za transport do vaših zgrada. Izgradi sistem i za buduću upotrebu.
Odlično, sada imamo neke stanovnike sa strujom i vodom. Ali čekaj, nešto tu i dalje nedostaje...
Gradonačelniče, mi nemamo radna mesta i mesta gde možemo nešto kupiti!
Uredu, mi takođe trebamo komercijalne i industrijske zone. Hajde da pogledamo pregled potražnje.
Ovde možeš videti potražnju za sta(stambene), kom (komercijalne) i ind (industrijske) građevine.
Za svaki tip (sta, kom i ind) postoje tri staleža bogastva: ₮, ₮₮ i ₮₮₮ koji se odnose na siromašne, srednje i bogate.
Naravno da mi želimo da imamo što više bogatih stanovnika, ali moramo polako. Kao što vidiš nama trebaju nekoliko ₮ komercijali za sad.
Proglašavnje još komercijalnih zona? Mislim da to možeš uraditi.
Dobro urađeno! Prema grafikonu potražnje, sada postoji potražnja za industrijkom zonom. Hajde da ga proglasimo manjim od našeg stambenog područja.
Zapamti! U proseku vam je potrebno onoliko komercijalnih i industrijskih područja koliko stambenih područja imate.
Možda ste primetili da je lako izgubiti jasan pogled u svom gradu. Stoga želim da vam predstavim: Mini-mapu
Odlično. Hajde da pogledamo druge magične stvari.
Ovde možete pogledati opšte informacije o vašem gradu. Možete ga preimenovati dodirom na njegovo trenutno ime.
Još jedan koristan alat je ovaj.
Pokazuje vam detalje o zadovoljstvu vaših stanovnika.
Zar ne bi bilo kul biti gospodar vremena? Pokušajte da napravite bilo šta brže.
A sada se vratite na normalnu brzinu...
Izvini što te prekidam, ali postoje stvari koje nisu magične. Novac kao na primer.
Ovde vam dajem kratak pregled našeg novca. Možemo da zaradimo od poreza, pa nam je u interesu da imamo što više stanovnika.
U nekim slučajevima možemo uzeti kredit... Nadajmo se da se to neće desiti ☺.
Mislim da imamo dovoljno novca...za sad. Fokusirajmo se više na izgradnju. Hajmo izgraditi parkove. Ljudi vole parkove.
Upss... to je jedan park više nego što sam želeo. Hajde da demoliramo jedan.
Dobar posao, do sada. Sada želim da vam predstavim indikator ranga. Pokazuje vam trenutni rang vašeg grada.
Dobivanjem novih stanovnika i rešavanjem katastrofa dolazite do sledećeg ranga vašeg grada. Na ovaj način omogućičete izgradnju novih građevina.
O katastrofama, desiće se... Možete pristupiti akcijskim sanagama preko ove kartice, kada su dostupne.
Dabi ste stvari učinili vidljivim, možete koristiti ovu karticu.
Rekao sam ti većinu stvari koje znam. Ali ostala je jedna važna stvar: Postoje pokloni.
Ako tražite sjajnu zajednicu u kojoj sam i ja, pronaćićeš na www.theotown.com
Mislim da sam sve rekao što imam da kažem...a da još jedna najbitnija stvar: Zabavi se! :)
Daje vam ograničenu mogućnost za super brzu igru.
Možeš koristiti super brzu brzinu duže vremena.
Ti si vrhunski gospodar svih vremena.Pruža vam odličnu izdržljivost za super brzu upotrebu.
Koristi neku strogu tajnu tehnologiju za kontrolu vremenskih prilika.
Koristi neku strogu tajnu tehnologiju za kontrolu vremenskih prilika.
Izgradi svoj grad u ovoj igri simulacije grada.

Da li želiš da napraviš svoj grad? U TheoTown-u možeš gledati tvoj grad kako raste. Deklariši zone za stambene, komercijalne i industrijske zgrade i pravi putuve da bi ih povezao. Napravi svoj grad atraktivnijim gradnjom parkova, škola i mnogo drugih objekata.
Ako pružiš TheoTown-u pristup spoljašnjoj memoriji, igra će čuvati mape u TheoTown/maps na tvom uređaju tako da ti imaš pristup njima.
Ogromna mašina za maglu koja može da proizvede maglu za ceo grad.
Ponekad se drveće mora ponovo posaditi ako je životna sredina previše zagađena i ugrožena. Šumari u šumarskim kolibama će automatski presađivati nova drveća.
Ponekad se drveće mora ponovo posaditi ako je životna sredina previše zagađena i ugrožena. Ova koliba će automatski presađivati nova drveća.
Građani se osećaju sigurno blizu bunkera. Oni su barem otporni na vatru.
Izgradi svoj aerodrom u ovom području uzletišta.
Samo neka slova koja će dati %1$s lične pažnje.
Neka slova koja se mogu postaviti i koristiti u dekorativne svrhe.
Možda ćete morati da ponovo pokrenete aplikaciju da bi biste pravilno promenili jezik.
A wonderful fountain that will delight the inhabitants of %1$s and you, too.
A wonderful fountain that will delight the inhabitants of your town and also you.
Big wires for a lot of energy. For regional energy exchange.
A transformer is needed to transform between high and normal voltage. Build it near a transmission line.
Come to the light side, we have icecream
Every pixel is made by hand
May contain traces of hard work
Allow gameplay upload without Wifi connection (may be expensive!)
Enter a new name for your airplane:
A long range airplane from TheoAir.
A golden variant of the long range airplane from TheoAir.
Make your airport more realistic with these decorations.
You have to build a tower in oder to control your airport
You have to ensure that your tower is working
Add a new lane for your airport
Only one lane at a time can be added
Enter a new name for your lane:
Enter your redeem code here to redeem it:
The entered redeem code could not be redeemed. Please check for typing errors.
An airport needs at least one tower to work properly.
An airport needs an entry so people can come into it.
Gates are needed for incoming/outgoing passengers.
A runway where planes can start and land. Minimum length is 12.
A double-deck, long range airplane from TheoAir. It has a lot of space.
Would you like to shorten this waiting time a bit?\n%1$s left.
Please help us and rate TheoTown
With the Starter Package you\'ll receive:
Login so that we can synchronize your profile.
Use this road to connect your gates with your runways.
Ever-expanding slime that will slowly consume not everything in sight.
Ever-expanding slime that will slowly consume everything in sight.
A hydroelectric Power Plant that can be used to create electricity using the power of rivers. Does not generate pollution.
Slime disasters will eat up your city. Of course, only if you want it to do so.
The Christmas tree will fill the hearts of your inhabitants with joy and glory. Do you see any presents?
The Jardine House is a office tower placed in Hong Kong. It has 52 floors and has a height of 179 m. It was completed in 1972.
The Bank of China Tower in Hong Kong houses the headquarters for the Bank of China HK. It has 70 floors, is 367 m high and was finished in 1990.
Children like to build snowmen in winter time.
The International Commerce Centre in Hong Kong is a 108 storey, commercial skyscraper. It\'s the tallest building in Hong Kong with a height of 484 m. It was completed in 2010.
A firework with the shape of a torch.
This firework mimics the shape of a jellyfish.
A switch to initiate fireworks. Connect it to wires.
Place and compose your own fireworks.
A switch that will automatically emit a signal on new year.
A fast long range airplane from TheoAir.
A red and yellow explosion combined with white fade.
A red explosion with a yellow fade out.
A red explosion with a cool light effect.
A beautiful explosion with mixed colors and a fade out.
Three white explosions combined with a red fade out.
Big rockets shot into the air.
Your first very own helicopter. Unfortunately, it won\'t listen to you.
Looks as if something is stucking in the ground. Better you remove it.
A radioactive destroyed structure. You should remove it.

The Brandenburg Gate is a German landmark that was built in the 18th century. It\'s located in Berlin.

The Arc de Triomphe in Paris honours those who fought and died in the French Revolutionary.

The Eiffel Tower in Paris is the most prominent landmark of France. The tower is 324 metres tall and was finished in 1889.

Buildings of this level are not that poor.
Buildings of this level are usually rich.
High buildings are typically more dense.
Parks and especially forest have a great nature influence.
Waste should be removed in order to make you inhabitants happy..

A one-way road only buses can drive on.
Want to get some diamonds for free by watching an ad?
Big Ben is a bell tower in London that is 96 m high and was built 1859.
The Angel of Independence is a monument in Mexico City that was built in 1910 to remember Mexico\'s War of Independence.
The Statue of Liberty was a gift from the French to the Americans. It was inaugurated in 1886 and is 93 meters high.
An old and rusty water tower. It does absolutely nothing.
Work like normal wires, but are placed underground so nobody has to see them.

A place for retired aircraft. It\'s dirty but produces some income.
Hey mayor, did you forget about your mission to build a great city?
There\'s not much free space left on your device (%,d MB).\n\nCities might not be saved due to insufficient space!
The Sydney Opera House is a multi-venue performing arts centre that is located in Sydney, Australia. It was completed in 1973 and has a height of 65 meters.
The One Raffles Place is a skyscraper in the city of Singapore that was built in 1986 and has a height of 280 meters.
The Willis Tower (also known as Sears Tower) is a skyscraper that is located in Chicago, United States. The tower was built in 1973 and is 442 meters high.

Want to build a specific road or building again? Use this tool and tap on it. Not supported by all structures.
Select a building in order to move it to a new place. Not all buildings can be moved.

Hi, I\'m glad that you\'d like to contribute to our gallery. However, before we can start you have to agree to our policy to allow us to upload screenshots for you.
\n\nOnly tap on agree if you agree to our policy for screenshot uploading.
The Leaning Tower of Pisa is a bell tower located in the Italian City of Pisa that was completed in 1372 and its height amounts to 56 meters.
The Burj Al Arab is a luxury hotel that is located in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. It was completed in 1999 and has a height of 321 meters.
The Hearst Tower is an office building in New York City that was built in 2006. It has a height of 182 meters.
Why burn the garbage or bring it to the landfill if it can be recycled in the buyback center?
A wild pickle appeared in %s. What will you do about it, mayor?
A rugby field for rugby fans.
Just an Easter egg. What will you do about it?

Congratulations, you found the Easter egg :)
You selected %d diamond priced buildings for removal. Are you sure that you want to remove them? There\'s a move building tool if you just want to move them.
The Oriental Pearl Tower is a TV tower in Shanghai whose construction was completed in 1994. The height of the tower amounts to 470 meters.
The Shanghai World Financial Center is a skyscraper that is located in Shanghai and was completed 2008. It\'s height is 494 meters.
A traditional pagoda with Sakura trees. What a lovely place.
The Saint Basil\'s Cathedral is a church in Moscow, Russia. It was completed in 1561 and is now a museum. Its height amounts to 115 meters.
Tō-ji is a Buddhist temple in Kyoto, Japan. It was completed in 796 and it has a height of 55 meters.

Reduces the emitted pollution and noise drastically.
The Taipei Financial Center in Taipei is a supertall skyscraper in Taiwan. It has a height of 510 meters and has been the tallest building in the world until 2010. It was finished in 2004.
Just some decorative stones lying near your road.
Which noise? I don\'t hear any.
You can see cars through it.

You\'ve probably seen this building before. The Chrysler Building in New York is famous for it\'s iconic look. Completed in 1930 the building has a height of 319m.
The Giza pyramid complex is the oldest of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World and well known around the world. The Great Pyramid is the largest of the three pyramids and has a height of 139m.
Tap on it to close it. A great way to create traffic jams.
The small hospital offers more space for more patients.
A beautiful church and convent for your city.

The Transamerica Pyramid is a 260m skyscraper in San Francisco that was completed in 1972 and is the home of financial services companies.

Welcome to the Plugin Store! Here you can get hundreds of additional contents for TheoTown made by players around the world.\n \n We recommend to read the plugin descriptions carefully to understand what a plugin does before you download it.
You can connect your game to one or multiple accounts.\n \n By connecting the game to a TheoTown Forum account you can participate in comment sections.
The demand describes the need for specific buildings. It is divided into residential, commercial and industrial demands. For each of them there are three different levels of wealth.
Some burnt down trees that you might want to remove.
Congratulations, this is a free spot that you can acquire to build your own city here.
Are you sure that you want to delete this region? This cannot be undone.
Are you sure that you want to reset this region? This cannot be undone.
Do you want to generate that region now?
In order to upload a region you have to connect TheoTown with a TheoTown account.
This will copy this region to the public list of online regions.\n\nOnce the region is uploaded you can claim parts on it online. If no password is set other players can join there then, too.
Here you can enter a password to access the region. Leave this field empty to set no password.

For balancing reasons we introduced a currency called Region Coins. You will earn them for free on a daily basis just by opening the game.\n\nThis currency allows us to offer you our online services for free.
Ensure that you have a stable internet connection before starting the process.
As of right now you can only upload regions that are not part of the game nor have any cities in them (yet).
In order to acquire a plot in a online region you have to connect TheoTown with a TheoTown account.
This plot is free so you can acquire it.
This is your plot. You can found a city here.
Wait some time before you acquire another city in that region.

Unfortunately your city could not be saved.

Please try again.

Welcome to online mode! Here you can play together with your friends to work on regions together! You can even upload your own custom regions to play with your friends.\n\n"It\'s pretty cool!" - our Discord administrator said.
You are using an outdated version that is not compatible with this feature anymore.\n\nPlease update your game.

If you think this is a reporting issue please ensure that the app has actually access to external storage.
This region is way too big to be uploaded :/
New information about your cities in online mode.

TheoTown uses the external storage permission in order to save cities and regions in an user accessible way. By doing so we can circumvent potential data loss caused by app updates or re-installation. \n\nThe game should be able to run without that permission. However, we don\'t take any responsibility for potential data loss or broken functionality caused by using the internal storage.
In order to proceed you have to specify a reason for this action.

We will now start with the tutorial to teach you the basics about how to build up your city.\n\n You can skip the tutorial if you already know how to play. You can skip the tutorial at any time in the game menu.

Currently assigned: %1$s
 Default: %2$s

Welcome to the TheoTown file manager. Here you can access and manage your maps, regions, plugins and so on.
Enter a name for the folder:

The Hassan II Mosque is a mosque in Casablanca, Morocco. It is the largest functioning mosque in Africa and is the 7th largest in the world. Its minaret is the world\'s second tallest minaret at 210 metres (689 ft).Completed in 1993, it was designed by Michel Pinseau under the guidance of King Hassan II and built by Moroccan artisans from all over the kingdom. The minaret is 60 stories high topped by a laser, the light from which is directed towards Mecca.The mosque stands on a promontory looking out to the Atlantic Ocean; worshippers can pray over the sea but there is no glass floor looking into the sea. The walls are of hand-crafted marble and the roof is retractable. A maximum of 105,000 worshippers can gather together for prayer: 25,000 inside the mosque hall and another 80,000 on the mosque\'s outside ground.
You may have to restart the game for changes to come into effect.\n\nDo you want to restart the game now?
Makes tunnels diamond free, lets tollbooths generate more income and makes roads cheaper overall in this city.
Lets tollbooths generate more income and makes roads cheaper overall in this city.
Local cities will still be stored locally, only
A new statue to celebrate our 20k members Discord anniversary. For this anniversary we held up a scavenger hunt which was completed first by our glorious member KolaKattz
A simple pavement to connect close buildings for pedestrians.
An oversized open box from which horses, cows, and other animals feed.
Option to reset cities in newly generated regions
Happiness about waste collection and disposal.
The spruce is a coniferous evergreen tree. It can be found in the northern temperate and boreal regions of the Earth. It can grow up to 60 meters.
A tree that can grow up to 30 meters and looks quite common.
Here, you can import/export energy, water, waste, and deceased bodies from/to neighboring cities.

Here you can view and adjust your taxes as well as view your monthly expenses. Richer habitants and workers pay more taxes. Too high taxes and your habitants will be unhappy and leave your city, resulting in low tax happiness. We recommend setting your taxes between 6.5 and 8.0.

Here you can view and adjust your taxes as well as view your monthly expenses. Richer habitants and workers pay more taxes. Too high taxes and your habitants will be unhappy and leave your city, resulting in low tax happiness. We recommend setting your taxes between 6.5 and 8.0.
Upload screenshots of your cities to the online gallery
The plugin you are about to download did not get many downloads or ratings yet. Therefore, it may not exactly hold up to your expectations.
Here you can see the happiness of your inhabitants. More happiness attract more people to live in your city. Tap on a row to see the corresponding distribution in the city.

The current rank of a city indicates its level of development. You can gain city points to reach the next level by getting more inhabitants or just developing the city in general. Unlocking a rank can unlock new buildings for you.
No money left? You can take a loan to continue building stuff. However, keep in mind that you will have to pay back the loan over time.
Staying healthy in a big city can be an issue. Build medical facilities to keep your inhabitants healthy and happy.
Many buildings need power to function. Ensure that you produce sufficient amounts of energy but also that everything is connected to the grid.
Here you see some general information about your city.
Education is essential for inhabitants to improve their living conditions but also to attract educated workers and investors.
This is essentially your air traffic control tower to control your airports. You can pick lanes from the map, buy airplanes, and assign the airplanes to the lanes.

Water is essential for life and your inhabitants are no exception. Ensure that you provide sufficient amounts of water and that you have everything connected with pipes. Don\'t place water pumps in polluted areas or your inhabitants will get sick.
These graphs can help you to track the development of the city. Use the arrows on the right side to switch between different graphs. The +/- buttons can be used to zoom in and out.
You can place ground easily by using this tool.
Are you sure you want to replace %s with this set? This cannot be undone.
You seem to be logged in using a Facebook account. Unfortunately, this kind of access is deprecated and can no longer be supported.\nPlease login using a forum account to migrate your data.

Unleash the magic of culture with our Cultural Delight Bundle! Experience the grandeur of an Opera House, accompanied by a serene park and enchanting fountain. Elevate your city\'s atmosphere and inspire your citizens with the harmonious blend of music, nature, and artistic allure. Upgrade now and let your city shine as a cultural masterpiece!

Step into the Melody Manor, your city\'s cultural heartbeat! This stunning Opera House adds a touch of elegance and finesse to your metropolis. Watch as it influences your citizens, turning them into refined connoisseurs of the arts. Let the harmonious vibes flow and the laughter rise!

Nestled beside the Opera House, Serene Symphony Park is an enchanting haven where nature dances to the melodies of opera. Relax in its lush green spaces, enjoy impromptu performances, and let the harmonious fusion of culture and nature rejuvenate your soul.

This integration adds better supply systems, few new service cars, a new road which is faster and is cheaper, a new disaster, DSA flags, new buildings, a lot of events, a space dimension to explore, new methods to earn money and much more.
Zone to declare DSA territory in the city.
Faster than normal road designed by DSA.
Insanely speedy road designed by DSA.
The headquarters for all DSA operations in the area.
Establishes DSA department for emergency services which increases public safety by dispatching special teams.
Establishes DSA department of research which overlooks research centers and bases in the area.
Establishes DSA department of resource management which manages resource gathering in the area.
Local DSA office with most qualified representatives.
DSA\'s most powerful ICBM capable of destroy anything that comes into contact with it.
A flare used to mark the target for „X-treme“ ICBM
DSA\'s missile silo prepared to launch „X-treme“ ICBM.
Building responsible for all local DSA space operations.
The home for all DSA\'s advanced technologies approved by the executive council of DSA.
Research new experimental advanced supply systems.
Research for ways to contain organisms and particles.
Research new rocket technology to explore and colonise other space bodies in the universe.
Research mind and physics bending technologies.
A totally inconspicuous place to purchase your clocks.
A decoration for your DSA base.
Now where did this rock come from?
A tribute to the first animal ever launched into Earth orbit.
Used for gathering valuable resources which are sold for a profit, however be aware of it having ability to cause earthquakes.
Upgrade the laser to be stronger and gather resources faster.\n\nOnly one upgrade is allowed at the same time. Old upgrades will be removed.
Introduce a lot of optimisations to increase the power efficiency of the station.\n\nOnly one upgrade is allowed at the same time. Old upgrades will be removed.
Upgrade the station to gather resources without interfering with the enviroment.\n\nOnly one upgrade is allowed at the same time. Old upgrades will be removed.
The CEO of DSA resides here and ensures DSA to do it\'s job.
A mansion of DSA\'s leader himself.
The world class cheese made for CEO of DSA.
Press this to arm this intercontinental ballistic missile.
A harsh place designed to keep in all evil-doers.
Teach prisoners the basics of things lowering the chance of them becoming criminals again.
Rocket is not fully supplied yet
Need: Dyson sphere built in space
Help the giant pickle on the moon
Energy from fusion is proven to be more efficient and cleaner than other energy, but it costs more in return.
Antenna used for transmitting power from Dyson sphere back to Theonia using microwave radio waves.\n\nNote: the outputted power is at very high voltage.
Produces water from synthesis reaction of hydrogen and oxygen.
A missile launch silo for DSA\'s greatest intercontinental ballistic missiles ever created.
A BSL-4 containment facility containing most dangerous substances known to man including the infamous poccolovirus.
Offers noise and pollution protection for your citizens.
Indestructible walls designed to hold destructive substances at bay.
An excellent machine used for cutting trees for thrice the cash.
The boundary at which the gravitational pull of a massive object becomes so great as to make escape impossible.
A region in spacetime in which tidal gravitational forces become infinite.
A virus of unknown origin which exhibits insane destructive properties.
A virus of unknown origin which exhibits insane destructive properties.
A mutated strain of geliumium which targets the regular virus.
Building for gathering and refining local minerals.
A depleted mining station which no longer serves any purpose
Set a living zone for inhabitants of your colony.
A cucumber cake in a pickle jar. Don\'t listen to it if it says something.
The place where DSA launches it\'s rockets from.\nRequires road access to industry for supplies.
Launch an empty experimental rocket to space to gather information and prepare for other launches and operations.\nSupplies: ${_dsareadiness}/1000
Launch a rocket with cat inside named Akial to space to gather vital information.\nSupplies: ${_dsareadiness}/2500
Launch a rocket with a man to space to conduct navigational tests.\nSupplies: ${_dsareadiness}/5000
Launch a rocket containing few sattelites to space to establish a satellite network.\nSupplies: ${_dsareadiness}/7500
Launch a rocket to the exploration mission to find a suitable place for colonisation.\nSupplies: ${_dsareadiness}/10000
Launch series of rockets to space to assemble the space defense initiative.\nSupplies: ${_dsareadiness}/15000
A limited edition cake made specifically for Lobby from the community!\nHappy Birthday to Lobby!
Hello there! I am the CEO of DSA and I will help you to manage all local DSA operations.
It appears as if the land started shaking!
Mayor, due to threat of an earthquake we are withdrawing disaster recovery funds.
Hey mayor, you can build some drills in your city to extract and sell minerals, but they have a small chance of causing an earthquake.
Mayor, our systems detected an unknown substance which is destroying everything in it\'s path.
Everyone, prepare for a lift off!
Hello mayor. I\'ve started building my little house here as you have allowed me to do so.
This is getting out of hand...Time for protocol „Explosive Stop“.
Quantum cores are explosive. Didn\'t you know?
Oh hello there, Mr. Hacker, you wouldn\'t mind a black hole, would ya?
Mayor, should we invest some money for disaster recovery in case everything goes wrong?
The rocket has reached the destination.\nWould you like to view it?
Morning mayor, can I build a house somewhere in your city where I would reside?
Initiating landing procedures, hang on tight!
You can exploit visible ore deposits with drilling stations for some income!
It seems like colonists are starving. Provide them with enough food!
Oof, sorry for the rough landing. We had to adapt some tech to work on here.
As you also probably saw, I\'ve transfered 10 million theons to build a small outpost.
Please spend the funds wisely as it\'s your only shot at this.
As for further funding, you may attempt exploiting those ore deposits.
Anyways, good luck, mayor! Remember, you can always return here by finding the map in your single cities list.
A big Happy Birthday from me and the community! I hope you have a wonderful day!
During this space exploration trip, we detected a big enough body to land on.\nConnecting you to the space command...
This space exploration trip returns nothing of interest.
Ah, yeah, oof, the rocket is on collision course with earth...HAVE FUN!
Congratulations mayor, we have established SDI network above this area. It will protect the city from meteorites and UFO invasions.
Congratulations! We\'ve constructed the greatest our achievement - the Dyson sphere!
That wasn\'t very cash money of you.
A strange structure with unknown use.
Might have some precious metals inside.
A vehicle used for landing on other space bodies.
Appears to be the overlord of pickles found in this region.
Seems like a form of an intelligent life.
Use or purpose of this object is unsure.
Building commanding all local and space operations in the vacinity.
Building which is used for easy transportation of goods, materials or people in space.
A place for colonists to remain fit and healthy.
Building for colonist faith and religion.
A station where garbage is recycled back into usable objects or materials.
Pipes used to transfer water to your local base.
Make water out of bodily fluids of colonists or synthesis.
Convert solar energy to power to light up your base.
Wires used to transfer electricity underground to your base.
Reinforced ground tracks for rovers and other vehicles.
A building with artificial ecosystem designed for food production.
Building where food and other critical supplies are stored.\nContents:\nFood: ${food_storage/10}/${total_food_storage/10}
Export helium 3 back to Theonia for use in fusion reactors. You\'d export enough Helium 3 for up to ${helium_amount} power plants.
Construct a megastructure around a star which would capture a large percentage of star\'s power output.\nMicrowave antenna will be required to receive power.
Building for gathering and refining Helium 3.
Building for gathering and refining Genericum.
Building for gathering and refining Poccolonum.
Remote used for controlling the Pidroid.
Build a remote to control the Pidroid.
One of the most intelligent and advanced robots ever made which runs on nuclear power.\n\nNOTE: due to safety concerns, the AI has been removed from this model.
You\'re never too old for a pickle
Not knowing what I could do
I see you\'ve ran out of money! I\'m sending the last remaining allocated funds for this project. Spend them wisely!
Investigate the artifact and send the collected data back to HQ for a monetary reward.
Some fake trees to keep the colonists happy.
A huge rocket specifically designed to fit a lot pickles inside it.
Unfortunately, moon regions are not yet supported. The city will now close!
I\'m sorry, I am unable to tell you anything of interest!
I\'m sorry, but I have nothing for you at this time.
Please do not be afraid! We came here with peace.
Well, crash landed would be more fitting.
We trust you won\'t hurt us. Do we trust you right?
Very well. You may do whatever you want to us, however we won\'t tell you anything.
That\'s great. Allow me to introduce myself.
I am GenericGiantPickleLeader#01 - leader of the Cucumber galaxy.
All we need is a little help. In return you may have all our knowledge.
I\'ll tell you the exact details later, I need to rest now.
You came back? Good, we thought you ran away!
We want to see if you have the willpower and what it takes for the task.
Destroy all the mining stations which are destroying this fine place!
I can still see some mining stations running, come back again when they are all offline.
I understand that you rely on those ores for resources...
But have you ever thought of investing in those strange structures, instead?
How about you give that a try, eh?
Come on, give researching artifacts a try!
We\'ve come to realisation that I need some things...
Namely, Poccolonum, a very nice resources that we will use later.
Just build a mining station on top of some of the green ore.
We\'ll take the ore for our project ourselves.
Don\'t be shy now, build a Poccolonum mine!
I am once again asking for your financial support
I need all of that thing you call theons.
Can you give me all your theons?
Too bad, hope you can change your mind later.
Trust me, I\'ll put it to good use.
I have one last favour, mayor
I assume you are familiar with rocket construction
Could you construct a rocket according to these schematics?
Being the generous pickle that I am, I\'ve gotten all resources for it
I see the rocket construction is still underway
I\'m afraid this is the last time we\'re seeing each other.
We are now ready to return to our home galaxy and rebuild it, provided that there\'s something left.
We will now hustle our way to the rocket.
Guess this is it. Thank you very much for helping us.
In return, we would like to give you this storage medium.
It contains all of our recorded knowledge.
Once you\'re ready, initiate the launch.
Oh, you don\'t have any available? Let me do a magic trick...
Here you can setup the amount to charge.
All of your previous purchases have been restored. You may have to restart the game in order to see an effect.
Perfect surface for cars and other vehicles alike.
Sun-dried wild grass. Perfect for vast plains or grasslands.
Shady grass from the deep woods.
Coarse sand mixed with small rocks.
Moist, lush grass. Perfect for wild forests.
We were told IT lives here.
A deciduous tree species commonly used for ornamental purposes.
Tall, orange-leaved trees that mostly thrive in colder climates.
Decorative evergreen conifers that are often used as Christmas trees.
Mixed small bush species. Great for parks and forests alike.
The path forward will not reveal itself to the weak. Venture forth with strength.
You will see, we have plenty of contents. Take your time to explore them all. After that, you may be ready to visit our plugin store to unlock thousands of additional contents.

Ready to dive into the fun? Unlock this awesome zone now and start your very own city adventure without the wait for those population requirements.\n\nNo more waiting – let\'s build some epic cities together!
Compacted dirt road. Cheap, but slow to move on. Great for rural areas.
Look out! A wooden lookout tower that can for example be used to watch out for fires.
Huge rock formation of assorted shapes.
Navigate with style using Highway Signs for your city roads.
Connect highways with slower roads or create elaborate interections with this one-way road.
Tall fence made of metal mesh.
A short, black railing to protect pedestrians.
Keep yourself safe with these metallic traffic barriers.
